mapper.select: select n.nowplayingno, n.roomno, n.movieno, TO_CHAR(n.playingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as playingtime, TO_CHAR(n.playingdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as playingdate, m.poster, tr.theaterno, t.brandno, t.theatername, t.theateraddress, t.theaterxgps, t.theaterygps, b.brandlogo, b.brandname from nowplaying n, movie m, THEATERROOM tr, theater t, brand b where n.movieno = m.movieno and n.roomno = tr.roomno and tr.theaterno = t.theaterno and t.brandno = b.brandno
